## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](../README.md#contributing).
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project and includes inline documentation where appropriate.
- [ ] I have added or updated tests to cover my changes.
- [ ] All existing and new tests pass (`pnpm run test`).
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README/config/example) if needed.
- [ ] I have checked that my change does not break existing workflows.
